CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 给；对；为；为了；以帮助；代表（某团体或机构）；受雇于；替…（做事）；替…（感到）；对…（常怀有某种感情）；供…使用；对…来说；由…（负责）；（意思）相当于；意思是；支持；拥护；以…为目的（或功能）；因为；由于；为得到；为获取；以…（命名）；至于…（用于指可以在文中其它地方找到的信息）；要不是；以…为交换；以…为代价；就…而言；…后（更好、更快乐等）；（表示去向）往；向；（表示一段时间）达；计；（安排或预定）在…时；对（某人）来说（困难、必需、愉快等）；是…的义务（或责任）；对应
因为；由于；既然；鉴于；考虑到

synonym.mean: 为，为了；因为；给；对于；至于；适合于

word_mean_info__list.difference: 从属连词，语意强，着重直接的原因或理由，所引出的从句是全句的重心，用以回答why提出的问题。
并列连词，语气较弱，所引出的句子一般放在后面，表示附带说明的理由或推断理由。
从属连词，语意较because, since弱，着重在主句，所表示的原因或理由是“附带的”。
语意比because弱，但比as强，一般用于表示“由于大家已知的事实”。
指特定的某一段时间，侧重事件持续时间的总长度。
侧重指习惯性的某一段时间，指继续的时间概念，突出事件发生的时刻

word_group.brief_definition: 准备用于；对...作好准备；为准备

bilingual.source: This is for good luck and peace.
Hunters are killing them for their fur.
bilingual.target: 猎人为了他们的皮毛而杀害他们。

bilingual.source: Humans catch whales for meat, fat and oil.
bilingual.target: 人类捕鲸是为了获取肉、脂肪和油。

bilingual.source: Her abandonment of her Spartan husband Menelaus for Paris of Troy provided the pretext for the Trojan War.
bilingual.target: 她为了特洛伊的帕里斯抛弃了她的斯巴达丈夫墨涅拉俄斯，这成为了特洛伊战争的借口。
她为了工作旅行得很远。
他学习空手道是为了自卫。

bilingual.source: She moved to Bern for her new job.
bilingual.target: 她为了新工作搬到了伯尔尼。

bilingual.source: She moved to Minsk for her new job.
bilingual.target: 她为了新工作搬到了明斯克。
他们为了冠军头衔而摔跤。

list.abstract: for（英[fɔː(r), fə(r)]，美[fɔːr , fər]），英文单词，作介词为支持；拥护；关于。作连词为因为；由于。短语搭配有care for（照顾）。例句为“Clothing takes a huge amount of natural resources is not healthy for the environment.（消耗大量的自然资源的服装，对环境不利。）” 该单词介词类近义词为regarding、towards、in the case of，连词类近义词为because、since、that。
《FOR》是WINNER演唱的一首歌曲，由YOON、MINO、HOONY、ZERO作词，YOON、KANG UK JIN、DIGGY、MINO作曲，收录于WINNER2018年10月3日发行的专辑《EVERYD4Y》中。

yingyinNormal.en: For Azeroth! For the Alliance!
yingyinNormal.zh: 为了艾泽拉斯！为了联盟！

yingyinNormal.en: For this house. For the presidency.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为了这栋房子。为了总统之位。

yingyinNormal.en: For Azeroth! For Azeroth and the Alliance!
yingyinNormal.zh: 为了艾泽拉斯！为了艾泽拉斯和联盟！

yingyinNormal.en: OK. That's for kidnapping me. That's for everything else.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，这是为了报复你绑架我，这是为了其它的一切。

yingyinNormal.en: Why? For the fairy dust. You know, the old Pixum.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么？为了这些精灵粉，你知道，为了精灵粉。

yingyinNormal.en: Why? For believing? For taking on Loki alone.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么，为了信念？他一个人去对付洛基。

yingyinNormal.en: Please pester her. Please, for me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 求你烦她吧，就当为了我。

yingyinNormal.en: But Columbus was looking for India!
yingyinNormal.zh: 但哥伦布出海就是为了找印度。

yingyinNormal.en: And all for what? A lousy medal?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这都为了什么? 就一个破奖牌?

yingyinNormal.en: Five pounds? It's all for good cause.
yingyinNormal.zh: 五英镑？这都是为了筹钱做好事。

yingyinNormal.en: I didn't work my whole life for a tie.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我这辈子这么努力可不是为了平局。

yingyinNormal.en: Sacks will do anything for his master.
yingyinNormal.zh: 萨克斯为了他的师父，会做任何事情。

yingyinNormal.en: Do convince me. For the sake of your loved ones.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一定要我相信。为了你爱的人们。

yingyinNormal.en: You put moths in my food?! For science.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在我食物里放虫子？！为了科学而献身。

yingyinNormal.en: Tell me you didn't sleep with Chuck for revenge.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别告诉我，你和恰克上床是为了报复。

yingyinNormal.en: It's about... Being there for Andy. We know.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而是为了... 陪在安迪身边。我们知道。

yingyinNormal.en: She works for you? Bloody right. Checks and balances.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她是你的人？是的，没错。这是为了制衡。

yingyinNormal.en: Anything for Sully. Okay. Have a blessed day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为了萨利，做什么都行。好，希望你们住得愉快。

yingyinNormal.en: Because the patriots gave their lives for a greater good.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为爱国者们为了更崇高的意义献出了生命。

yingyinNormal.en: Vinyl? Yeah, going for a non-threatening huggable kind of thing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乙烯树脂？对，为了做出无害又可爱的效果。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (once and for all)彻底; 一劳永逸

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: It is still challenging to get insurance <highlight>for</highlight> family members.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为家庭成员购买保险仍然是一个挑战。

examination_example.sentence: I find courage an essential quality <highlight>for</highlight> the understanding, let alone the performance, of his works.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我发现，要理解他的作品，勇气是必不可少的，更不用说演奏他的作品了。

examination_example.sentence: Firms are now studying how genes interact, looking <highlight>for</highlight> correlations that might be used to determine the causes of disease.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 公司现在正在研究基因如何相互作用，寻找可能用于确定疾病原因。

examination_example.sentence: His status in headquarters and the recognition given to him <highlight>for</highlight> his work were bound up with the class politics of the army.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他在司令部的地位，以及对他的工作的认可都与军队的阶级政治息息相关。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>For</highlight> the first time in history more people live in towns than in the country.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 城镇居住人口有史以来第一次超过了农村居住人口。

examination_example.sentence: And <highlight>for</highlight> women who work outside the home, they often are playing catch-up-with-household tasks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于在外工作的女性来说，她们经常在做家务。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>For</highlight> all the possibilities of our new culture machines, most people are still stuck in download mode.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于我们新文化机器的所有可能性，大多数人仍然停留在下载模式。

examination_example.sentence: Paywalled <highlight>for</highlight> a year or more so that the publishers can make a profit before being placed on general release.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一年或更长时间内付费下载，这样发行商就可以在正式发行前盈利。

examination_example.sentence: Society has an interest in their performance, not just <highlight>for</highlight> the short term but <highlight>for</highlight> the long term.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 社会对他们的表现感兴趣，不仅是短期的，也是长期的。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>For</highlight> a time literature showed no interest in this public stage.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有一段时间，文学对这个公共舞台不感兴趣。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>For</highlight> instance, failure can help you discover how strong a person you are.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，失败可以帮助你发现你是一个多么坚强的人。

examination_example.sentence: Curiosity is often considered a good instinct — it can lead to new scientific advances, <highlight>for</highlight> instance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 好奇心通常被认为是一种良好的本能——例如，它可以带来新的科学进步。

examination_example.sentence: Justice Antonin Scalia, <highlight>for</highlight> example, appeared at political events.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，大法官安东宁·斯卡利亚出现在政治事件中。

sense_info_list.en: used to show where sb/sth is going

examination_example.sentence: And people who run <highlight>for</highlight> the bus?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那些跑向公共汽车的人呢？

examination_example.sentence: The Renaissance was over and it was time <highlight>for</highlight> a new era - the Age of Reason.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 文艺复兴已经结束，是时候进入一个新时代了——理性时代。

examination_example.sentence: And guilt can encourage humans to make up <highlight>for</highlight> errors and fix relationships.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 而内疚可以鼓励人类弥补错误，修复关系。

examination_example.sentence: The industry is betting that the same consumers paying more <highlight>for</highlight> premium attributes such as free-range, non-GMO, and pasture-raised eggs will embrace sustainability.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该行业相信，愿意为自由放养、非转基因和牧场饲养等优质鸡蛋掏钱的消费者也会接受可持续性。

examination_example.sentence: The services are paid <highlight>for</highlight> by advertisers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些服务由广告商付费。

examination_example.sentence: Other scientists perform the specialised work of peer review also <highlight>for</highlight> free.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其他科学家也免费从事同行评审的专业工作。

examination_example.sentence: As a condition of receiving state approval <highlight>for</highlight> the sale, the company agreed to seek permission from state regulators.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作为获得州政府批准出售的一个条件，该公司同意寻求州政府监管机构的许可。

sense_info_list.zh: (once and for all)彻底; 一劳永逸

examination_example.sentence: It needs once and <highlight>for</highlight> all to bar broadband providers from meddling in the traffic on their network .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它需要一劳永逸地禁止宽带提供商干预其网络流量。

examination_example.sentence: These eggs, which are making their debut now on shelves <highlight>for</highlight> as much as $8 a dozen, are still labeled organic and animal-friendly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些鸡蛋现在在货架上首次亮相，售价高达8美元一打，但仍然贴着有机和动物友好型的标签。

examination_example.sentence: As a replacement <highlight>for</highlight> organic eggs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作为有机鸡蛋的替代品。

examination_example.sentence: Were it not <highlight>for</highlight> opportunities to observe these wild creatures close to home people would travel to wild areas to seek out disturb.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果不是有机会观察这些离家很近的野生动物，人们会去野外寻找干扰。

examination_example.sentence: Businesses should engage in conversations with the marketers and advertisers responsible <highlight>for</highlight> sign-ups, checkout baskets, pricing, and promotions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 公司应与负责注册、购物车、定价和促销设计的营销人员及广告人员进行交谈。

examination_example.sentence: Zoos are at the forefront of conservation and constantly evolving to improve how they care <highlight>for</highlight> animals and protect each species in its natural habitat.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 处于保护最前沿的动物园不断发展，以改善他们照顾动物的方式并保护自然栖息地中的每一个物种。

word_usage.usage: for 和 to 都可以用于谈论某人的目的，但是所用结构不同。表示目的时，for 后面必须接名词，例如:Occasionally I go to the pub for a drink (我偶尔会到酒吧里喝一杯)。for 一般不用在动词前，可以在-ing形式前用for来描述某物的用途，例如:a small machine for weighing the post (给邮件称重的小机器)

表示“（时间）持续”时，for 用于表示在过去、现在或将来持续的一段时间，或某事发生之前的时间长短。例如：She slept for eight hours (她睡了8个小时)，而since 用于表示一段时间的开始，例如：She has been with the group since it began (这个集团创建之初她就在那里工作)，since 也可用于指某事最后一次发生的时间或某事发生之前的时间长短，例如：She hadn't eaten since breakfast (她早饭后就没吃过东西)

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 作出满意说明；提供；构成；解释；说明；占...(数量/比例)
是…的缩写；代表；表示；拒绝忍受；拒绝容忍；支持；逐渐靠岸
参加；报名竞赛；报名参加
为…创造条件；为…做好准备
为补偿...；为弥补...；用于补偿...
爱慕(某人)；赞赏(某事)；上当；受骗

examination_example.sentence: How much did Gomez pay <highlight>for</highlight> the football game last time?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 戈麦斯上次为足球赛付了多少钱？

examination_example.sentence: That way, cattlemen will know whether they need to move their cattle to another field <highlight>for</highlight> nutrition purposes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这样一来，养牛人就会知道他们是否需要把牛转移到另一块地来获取营养。

examination_example.sentence: Perhaps my best reason <highlight>for</highlight> editing this book is a hope of sharing my enthusiasm <highlight>for</highlight> the theater with others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 也许我编辑这本书的最佳理由是希望与他人分享我对戏剧的热情。

examination_example.sentence: You just kept walking and walking <highlight>for</highlight> four hours?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你就这样走了四个小时？

examination_example.sentence: It's been her dream <highlight>for</highlight> a long time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一直是她的梦想。

examination_example.sentence: You can keep your head clear <highlight>for</highlight> 4-10 hours after exercise.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 运动后你可以保持头脑清醒4-10小时。

examination_example.sentence: Many lessons are now available online, from which students can choose <highlight>for</highlight> free.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多课程现在都可以在线学习，学生们可以免费选择。

examination_example.sentence: Cards can attend the events <highlight>for</highlight> free.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 卡片可以免费参加活动。

examination_example.sentence: The report does little to counsel parents looking <highlight>for</highlight> data about the effect of e-readers and tablets on reading.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该报告对寻求电子阅读器和平板电脑对阅读影响的数据的家长几乎没有什么建议。

examination_example.sentence: Look <highlight>for</highlight> a job.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 找一份工作。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>For</highlight> most people, having things stolen feels like an offence.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对大多数人来说，东西被偷，感觉像是一种冒犯。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>For</highlight> people, who are interested in sound, the field of sound technology is definitely making noise.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于那些对声音感兴趣的人来说，声音技术领域无疑就是制造噪音。

examination_example.sentence: Or I'll be late <highlight>for</highlight> a meeting.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 否则我开会要迟到了。

examination_example.sentence: Last week she walked up to the store, but when she went to pay <highlight>for</highlight> her groceries, she was short about three dollars.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 上周，她走到商店，但当她去支付食品杂货时，她缺了大约三美元。

examination_example.sentence: There are no more continents and no more moons to search <highlight>for</highlight>, little left to discover.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没有更多的大陆和卫星可供搜索，几乎没有发现的余地。

examination_example.sentence: China's National Highway 318, extending over 5,000 kilometers from Shanghai to Zhangmu, Tibet, is known as the "heavenly road" <highlight>for</highlight> its amazing views.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中国318国道从上海延伸至西藏樟木，全长5000多公里，因其惊人的景观而被称为“天路”。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 关于; 对于; 在...方面
(时间/距离)达; 计; 表示一段时间

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 准备用于；对...作好准备；为准备
是…的缩写；代表；表示；拒绝忍受；拒绝容忍；支持；逐渐靠岸
参加；报名竞赛；报名参加
因...而闻名；因...而出名；因...而知名
就业竞争；岗位竞争；求职的竞争
毫无理由；无原因；无理由
为此；由于这个原因；因此
袭击；攻击；选择；支持；争取；喜欢
请求许可；要求获准；请求准许
为...欢呼；为...助威；为...加油鼓劲
很长时间；很久；对于年龄
为高兴；为快乐；为了愉悦
将来；未来；为将来；为未来
对...做好准备；准备用于；准备就绪

examination_example.sentence: Someday, you will pay 20 times the cost <highlight>for</highlight> breaking your promise.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 总有一天，你会为违背诺言付出20倍的代价。

examination_example.sentence: It's known worldwide <highlight>for</highlight> its production of grapes and the Hami melons.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它以出产葡萄和哈密瓜而闻名于世。

examination_example.sentence: When the lanterns are lit, they slowly rise into the air like small hot-air balloons <highlight>for</highlight> all to see.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当灯笼点燃时，它们像热气球一样慢慢升到空中，让所有人都能看到。

sense_info_list.zh: 关于; 对于; 在...方面

examination_example.sentence: It's time <highlight>for</highlight> us to take action together.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 是我们一起行动的时候了。

examination_example.sentence: So I want to say thank you <highlight>for</highlight> making our 'grown-up' experience so amazing and fun.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此我想感谢你们让我们的“成人”经历如此精彩和有趣。

examination_example.sentence: There is an advantage <highlight>for</highlight> them, they get to eat some of the fish that escape (逃脱) from the net.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于它们来说有好处的，它们可以吃到一些从渔网逃脱出来的鱼。

examination_example.sentence: Though it is small, the pen has changed the history, improved the trade of countries, recorded events, carried news, and done far more work <highlight>for</highlight> human beings than all other tools.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然它很小，但笔改变了历史，推动了国家贸易，记录了事件，传播了新闻，为人类做了比其他工具多得多的工作。

examination_example.sentence: As Tolstoy once said, "One can live magnificently in this world if one knows how to work and how to love, to work <highlight>for</highlight> the person one loves and to love one's work."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正如托尔斯泰所言：“一个人如果知道如何工作，如何去爱，如何为自己所爱的人工作，以及去爱自己的工作的话，他就能在这人世间活的精彩。”

examination_example.sentence: They didn't have a school <highlight>for</highlight> their kids.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们的孩子没有学校。

sense_info_list.zh: (时间/距离)达; 计; 表示一段时间

examination_example.sentence: My mother just held me while I sobbed <highlight>for</highlight> hours.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我哭哭啼啼的几个小时里，妈妈只是抱着我。

examination_example.sentence: Imagine working <highlight>for</highlight> 12 hours, always on your feet, and then dealing with the most rude customers?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 想象一下，工作12个小时，总是站着，然后和最粗鲁的顾客打交道？

examination_example.sentence: After lying <highlight>for</highlight> hours on cold ground, your fingers would probably be so numb (麻木的) that you could hardly move them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在冰冷的地面上躺了几个小时后，你的手指可能会麻木得几乎无法动弹。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>For</highlight> example, students might lie to their teachers about unfinished homework.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，学生可能会就未完成的家庭作业对老师撒谎。

examination_example.sentence: In China, <highlight>for</highlight> example, only 20% of the boys are active enough, compared to 11% of the girls.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，在中国，20%的男孩（运动）足够活跃，相比之下，女孩只有11%。

examination_example.sentence: Club activities, sports, computer-game playing, and TV viewing, <highlight>for</highlight> example, all contribute to（促成）teens having less time <highlight>for</highlight> both homework and sleep．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，俱乐部活动、体育运动、电脑游戏和看电视都会使青少年的家庭作业和睡眠时间减少。

examination_example.sentence: We call <highlight>for</highlight> more educational resources to these places.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们呼吁向这些地方提供更多的教育资源。

examination_example.sentence: There is a popular Chinese saying that "Fair skin (皮肤) will make up <highlight>for</highlight> three flaws (缺陷) ".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中国有句俗话叫"一白遮百丑"。

examination_example.sentence: Basically, an electric car can go twice as far as a gas car <highlight>for</highlight> the same price.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 基本上，同样的价格，一辆电动车的续航能力是一辆燃油汽车的两倍。

examination_example.sentence: They can bring you much pleasure <highlight>for</highlight> sure.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们肯定能给你带来很多快乐。

examination_example.sentence: can leave the restaurant <highlight>for</highlight> free
examination_example.sentence_trans: 可以免费离开餐厅

examination_example.sentence: Some thought the company did not care <highlight>for</highlight> them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有些人认为公司不关心他们。

word_usage.usage: for是并列连词，引导并列从句，表示原因的语气很弱，一般是对结果作出推断性的补充说明或解释，不表示直接原因。用法较正式，一般用于书面语。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 从属连词，语意较because，since弱，侧重主句，所述理由多是明显的或已知的。
从属连词，语意强，强调直接的原因或理由，所引出的从句为全句的重心，通常用来回答由why引导的疑问句。
并列连词，语气较弱，所引出的句子一般放在后面，表示补充说明性的理由。
语意比because弱，但略强于as，一般用于所述原因是已知的客观事实，或被当作推断理由的情况。
强调习惯性的某一段时间，也指继续的时间概念，突出事件发生的时刻。
多指特定的某一段时间，或侧重事件持续时间的总长度。
